thread.section_title: 11 Howard - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Swank swank and swank
thread.title_full: Swank swank and swank - Review of 11 Howard, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mjknows
title: Swank swank and swank
text:
Fantastic new boutique hotel in funky area of NYC. Love everything about it.
Rooms are gorg but small - very little space to negotiate around the beds. Would be hard for a large person. Bath was a bit roomier.
Le Coucou is top rated - reserve ahead and don't miss the gougeres. Also available via room service, thanksfully.
Bar opens to public at 9 ( I think) and was a super trendy / new / lines / celebs / bouncers type scene.
Self park if you can find a better deal in a local garage (to save $.)
